mutants.original_line: arr = [x - min_length for x in arr if x != min_length]
mutants.mutated_line: arr = [x + min_length for x in arr if x != min_length]
mutants.code:
def cut_the_sticks(arr):
    result = []
    while arr:
        result.append(len(arr))
        min_length = min(arr)
        arr = [x + min_length for x in arr if x != min_length]
    return result

def cut_the_sticks(arr):
    result = []
    while arr:
        result.append(len(arr))
        min_length = min(arr)
        arr = [x - min_length for x in arr if x == min_length]
    return result
